extension.summary: A simple all-around Maintenance Tool
extension.description: PSMC's Maintenance does many maintenance functions needed to help with a much smoother PSMC (Kodi) experience without all the fluff. Features include: Auto delete of cache at start up, notifies when packages and thumbs reach a set amount of wasted storage space (you can set and change sizes), cuts down on your devices read/writes on the ROM. Also has many Backup/Restore Options, Speed test, IP check and other features!!
extension.news: [B][COLOR FFFFFF00]Version 1.0.6[/COLOR][/B][CR]- License updated[CR]- Minor changes[CR]- Minor changes[CR]- Minor changes[CR]- Cosmetic Fixes[CR]- Initial release

extension.summary: The OFFICIAL [B]Fuzzy Britches Addon[/B]
extension.description: [B][COLOR yellow]The Official Fuzzy Britches Addon[/B][/COLOR][CR]Created for my beautiful wife (nicknamed [COLOR yellow]Fuzzy Britches[/COLOR]). Works with Kodi
extension.disclaimer: The author of this addon does NOT host any of the content which is found and has no affiliation with any of the content providers. This addon simply searches websites for content. This addon does not form part of the Kodi Media Center. Please do not seek assistance with this addon from any of the Official Kodi Support Channels. Use at your own risk! The code for this addon was patched together by The Papaw.
extension.news:
[COLOR yellow]• Latest Changes[/COLOR] - (08-19-19) [COLOR blue]• [/COLOR]Various Fixes or Updates [COLOR blue]• [/COLOR][B][COLOR yellow]To achieve the best results using the torrent scrapers, go into Fuzzy Britches > Tools > ResolveURL: Settings > Universal Resolvers and scroll down the list for each provider you use. If there is an option for that provider that says[/COLOR][/B][B][COLOR red] "Cached torrent only"[/COLOR][/B], [B][COLOR yellow]make sure to turn it[/COLOR][/B][B][COLOR red] ON[/COLOR][/B][B][COLOR yellow]. No more Popups when scraping torrents![/COLOR][/B]
Please give credit to all the devolopers that have and do contribute to this addon!

extension.summary: Downloads Artwork for TV shows, Movies and Music videos for addons and stores them in a local SQLITE database
extension.description: Queries, stores, and returns metadata for TV shows, Movies and Musicvideos. [CR]Sources:[CR]www.thetvdb.com[CR]www.themoviedb.org[CR]www.imdb.com[CR]www.omdbapi.com[CR]This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
Resolver enlaces a videos de sitios populares para poder reproducirlos en XBMC/Kodi.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju.
Επίλυση συνδέσμων κοινών εξυπηρετητών σε μορφή βίντεο ικανό για αναπαραγωγή στο XBMC/Kodi.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju, pojednostavnjuje razvoj priključaka za video dodatke koji zahtjevaju višestruke video izvore.

extension.summary: Movie Set Artwork Automator
extension.description:
This addon will automatically set artwork for all movie sets in your library.
The addon can search for common parent folders of movies within a set or you can specify a single artwork folder containing artwork for all your movie sets (eg <set name>-poster.jpg).
Unofficial RealDebrid client. Manage your torrents, unrestricted links and view host statuses all within Kodi.
extension.summary: Unofficial RealDebrid client. Manage your torrents, unrestricted links and view host statuses all within Kodi.
extension.news: v0.5 - added "Play using RealDebrid" to context menu

extension.summary: Script used by skins to show extended media info.
extension.description: This script fetches extended information for several media types (artists, albums, movie sets etc.). Needs skin support.

extension.news: Add 4k support

extension.summary: [COLOR FFFFFF00]COMPLETELEY[/COLOR] redesigned. Skin updated and modded. Added home screen animation [I][COLOR FFE67300]{can be disabled in settings}[/COLOR][/I], new features and views.
extension.description: [COLOR FFFFFF00]COMPLETELEY[/COLOR] redesigned. Skin updated and modded. Added home screen animation [COLOR FFE67300] which can be disabled in settings[/COLOR], new features and views. Created for use with PSMC [I]{a Kodi fork}[/I]. Please give credit to Mike, The Papaw and all others that have contributed.[I][COLOR FFE67300] You will need to enable the Batman GUI SOUNDS in the System Settings if you wish to use them.[/COLOR][/I] [I](themed from AeonNoxSilvo)[/I]
extension.news: [B][I][COLOR FFFFFF00]Skin updated, modded and Completely Redesigned[/COLOR][/I][/B][CR][COLOR FF00D5FF]- Added NEW Home Screen Animation[/COLOR][CR][COLOR FF00D5FF]- Additional Falling Seasons[/COLOR][CR][COLOR FFE67300]Included with v7.9.4 Silvo update by Mike[/COLOR][CR]- Fix Live TV OSD button focus when unable to pause[CR]- Fixes to DialogSelect[CR]- Fix no items in Ask Default Background selection on new installs[CR]- Drop Skin Helper Widgets for favorites and use favourites:// path instead[CR]- Update and add some missing icons[CR]- Fix Netherlands rating classification images[CR]- Update and re-design PVR Group Manager[CR]- Fix Menu resetting to defaults[CR]- Add TMDb search from DialogVideoInfo Extras on Home screen[CR]- Fix missing icon/poster in SlimList[CR]- PVR updates and additions[CR]- Updated language files from Transifex[CR]- Revert removal of bottom OSD button position[CR]- Add option to use Skin Info Service for Movie Set Plots in Video Info[CR]- Fix default letter jump appearing on side menu settings button focus[CR]- Add "fixed" option for video RightList[CR]- Tweak Vertical Menu fixed behaviour to match Horizontal[CR]- Rework Live TV guide with icons from Estuary and re-add channel logos[CR]- Add disable to submenu items in Main Menu Customizer[CR]- Add information setting to SlimList[CR]- Remove script.extendedinfo and add script.embuary.info support[CR]- Add DialogVideoInfo for sets[CR]- Add some v19 skin engine changes[CR]- Use script.embuary.helper for Similiar and Directer movies in DialogVideoInfo[CR]- Add missing PVR label to Widget info[CR]- Add Glow Bars and System Glow Bars to color customizer[CR]- Add Jump to Letter bar to Video library using script.embuary.helper[CR]- Fix playlist backgrounds for Main Menu not following user set rotation speed[CR]- Redesign DialogExtendedProgressBar and DialogVolumeBar[CR]- Make OSD buttons on top default and remove option[CR]- Redesign PlayerProcessInfo[CR]- Clean up Main Menu and Widget Customizers[CR]- Fill empty space with more info in some views[CR][CR][B]All updates may contain various changes and/or improvements[/B][CR][I][COLOR FFFF0202]Please give credit to all the devolopers (Especially Mike) that has shared most of these changes. Also all others that have and do contribute to this skin![/COLOR][/I]

extension.summary: [COLOR FFFFFF00]COMPLETELEY[/COLOR] redesigned. Skin updated and modded. Added home screen animation [I][COLOR FFE67300]{can be disabled in settings}[/COLOR][/I], new features and views.

Added home screen animation [COLOR FFE67300] which can be disabled in settings[/COLOR], new features and views. Created for use with PSMC [I]{a Kodi fork}[/I]. Please give credit to Mike, The Papaw and all others that have contributed.[I][COLOR FFE67300] You will need to enable the Toy Story GUI SOUNDS in the System Settings if you wish to use them.[/COLOR][/I] [I](themed from AeonNoxSilvo)[/I]
extension.news: [B][I][COLOR FFFFFF00]Skin updated, modded and Completely Redesigned[/COLOR][/I][/B][CR][COLOR FF00D5FF]- Added NEW Home Screen Animation[/COLOR][CR][COLOR FF00D5FF]- Additional Falling Seasons[/COLOR][CR][COLOR FFE67300]Included with v7.9.4 Silvo update by Mike[/COLOR][CR]- Fix Live TV OSD button focus when unable to pause[CR]- Fixes to DialogSelect[CR]- Fix no items in Ask Default Background selection on new installs[CR]- Drop Skin Helper Widgets for favorites and use favourites:// path instead[CR]- Update and add some missing icons[CR]- Fix Netherlands rating classification images[CR]- Update and re-design PVR Group Manager[CR]- Fix Menu resetting to defaults[CR]- Add TMDb search from DialogVideoInfo Extras on Home screen[CR]- Fix missing icon/poster in SlimList[CR]- PVR updates and additions[CR]- Updated language files from Transifex[CR]- Revert removal of bottom OSD button position[CR]- Add option to use Skin Info Service for Movie Set Plots in Video Info[CR]- Fix default letter jump appearing on side menu settings button focus[CR]- Add "fixed" option for video RightList[CR]- Tweak Vertical Menu fixed behaviour to match Horizontal[CR]- Rework Live TV guide with icons from Estuary and re-add channel logos[CR]- Add disable to submenu items in Main Menu Customizer[CR]- Add information setting to SlimList[CR]- Remove script.extendedinfo and add script.embuary.info support[CR]- Add DialogVideoInfo for sets[CR]- Add some v19 skin engine changes[CR]- Use script.embuary.helper for Similiar and Directer movies in DialogVideoInfo[CR]- Add missing PVR label to Widget info[CR]- Add Glow Bars and System Glow Bars to color customizer[CR]- Add Jump to Letter bar to Video library using script.embuary.helper[CR]- Fix playlist backgrounds for Main Menu not following user set rotation speed[CR]- Redesign DialogExtendedProgressBar and DialogVolumeBar[CR]- Make OSD buttons on top default and remove option[CR]- Redesign PlayerProcessInfo[CR]- Clean up Main Menu and Widget Customizers[CR]- Fill empty space with more info in some views[CR][CR][B]All updates may contain various changes and/or improvements[/B][CR][I][COLOR FFFF0202]Please give credit to all the devolopers (Especially Mike) that has shared most of these changes. Also all others that have and do contribute to this skin![/COLOR][/I]
